channel.title: Yay, another request by me
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Got another request, because, as you all know, I suck at graphics, and you are all amazing.
Dynamic sigs seems to be the boom now-a-days and everyone seems to have one for something or other, including me. I've written all of the PHP side of things to put my desired text onto a image, its just i don't have an image to put it onto.
Soooo, i was wondering if someone could create me a Stress Miner image so i can have dynamic sigs :D
Size should be about this big, maybe a big smaller (ignore all of the text, thats just me mucking around with the PHP etc):
[img]http://starblaster100stressminer.freehostia.com/stress/Mystressbg.png[/img]
Yes i know it sucks lol, thats why I'm asking you guys.
Images: The Rune Stack? Any better suggestions?
Color: Something light, like the background color i have above? Something to blend well with the stock image well.
"Stress Miner by Starblaster100" on the pic somewhere
and then 4 boxes which i can fill in with 4 fields --> Username, Ess Mined, Total Runs, Total Randoms. However, I will physically write Username, Ess Mined, Total Runs, Total Randoms on the image myself like in the image above, you don't need to do that for me.
Thanks a lot in advance, i appreciate it :D
Starblaster100

item.title: Yay, another request by me
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

yes thats the idea

Read full topic

item.title: Yay, another request by me
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Thats pretty good star. You now have a variety for the people who want to use it ;\

Read full topic

item.title: Yay, another request by me
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

tried stacks of ess, they looked shit. what other big pic can i use instead of that ess column then? and how do i add grey shading to the text in php
thansk

updated

Read full topic

item.title: Yay, another request by me
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

RXVL:

Just add a small gray shade to the text to make it more noticeable.

You could also ask Kloplop321 for his method of outlining text, Star.

And idk about the essence tower thing… it looks like a gray turd. Maybe just stacks of essence would look better?

Read full topic

item.title: Yay, another request by me
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

oh, Thank you

Yea, i know the Stress Miner by Starblaster100 text is mucked up there, i was mucking around with the font sizes and didn’t have time to change it back.

So should i attempt to carry on with this one, hand the .png to someone to complete or let someone start another one?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

exe626:

Except for the "Stress Miner By Starblaster100’ on the current one, it looks pretty good ;\

I’ll have to agree with him. It looks good, and the images are appropriate for what the dynamic sig is for
